code: @Test public void uncaughtExceptionDoesNotForwardLoggedErrorToParent() {     Thread thread = Thread.currentThread().     Exception ex = new Exception().     this.handler.registerLoggedException(ex).     this.handler.uncaughtException(thread, ex).     verifyZeroInteractions(this.parent). }

@Test public void uncaughtExceptionForwardsLogConfigurationErrorToParent() {     Thread thread = Thread.currentThread().     Exception ex = new Exception("[stuff] Logback configuration error detected [stuff]").     this.handler.registerLoggedException(ex).     this.handler.uncaughtException(thread, ex).     verify(this.parent).uncaughtException(thread, ex). }

@Test public void uncaughtExceptionForwardsWrappedLogConfigurationErrorToParent() {     Thread thread = Thread.currentThread().     Exception ex = new InvocationTargetException(new Exception("[stuff] Logback configuration error detected [stuff]", new Exception())).     this.handler.registerLoggedException(ex).     this.handler.uncaughtException(thread, ex).     verify(this.parent).uncaughtException(thread, ex). }
